#include<iostream>

using namespace std;

int main()
{

  int num,prev,flag=0,i,j,first;

  long row,col;

  cin>>row>>col;

  cin>>prev;

  for(i=1;i<col;i++)
  {

    cin>>num;

    if(num!=prev)
    {

      flag=1;

      //break;

    }

  }

  first=num;

  for(i=1;i<row;i++)
  {

   cin>>prev;

   for(j=1;j<col;j++)
   {

     cin>>num;

     if(prev!=num)
     {

       flag=1;

       //break;

       //cout<<"j loop\n";

     }

   }

   if(num==first)
   {

     flag=1;

     //cout<<"i loop\n";

   }

   first=num;

  }

  if(flag)  cout<<"NO\n";

  else cout<<"YES\n";

  return 0;

}
